$interpreted: Angelia: What do you think Nigel wants to tell us? It's getting pretty late, and it's dark outside.
Naya: How should I know? He's always hard to predict.
Nigel: Apologies for the long wait,
Nigel: Princess Angelia, Your Highness.
Naya: ...Haha. What? Don't know what you're talking about.
Nigel: Drop the facade. The Kingdom of The Sun declares the princess ill,
Nigel: yet her time in recovery seems to match your arrival at the Slums a little too well, wouldn't you say?
Naya: It's just a coincidence, that's all!
Nigel: We've done a thorough investigation. Although it may seem inconceivable, the girl standing behind you is indeed Her Highness, Princess Angelia.
Angelia: We?
Nigel: I've been meeting with people in secret,
Nigel: forming an intelligence organization.

Angelia: Intelligence organization? Lio mentioned
you're often absent, so that was the reason?
Naya: I see. You're not as simple as you look~
Nigel: Yamitsuki, stay back. We still need her help.
Angelia: Help?
Nigel: My intelligence organization has but one purpose...

Nigel: ...to collect evidence against Theodore's crimes,
and reveal them to the world!
Angelia: Uncle...Theodore? Crimes? What do you mean?
Nigel: Theodore is not the man you've come to know. Turning a blind eye to illegal miners, and silencing those whose opinions differ...
Nigel: Even your kidnapping was his own wretched plan!
Naya: You know about the kidnapping?!
Angelia: How can that be? My uncle is not a criminal! How dare you speak of him like that!
Nigel: What if I had proof?
Yamitsuki: The reconstruction blueprint for the castle. You will understand once you see it.
Angelia: ...This is...didn't he say simple maintenance? Why is there so much I don't know about?
Nigel: As far as I'm aware, Theodore wants to make the castle fly.
Naya: Make the castle fly? What kind of idiotic plan is that!
Nigel: An airborne castle would be a great advantage. A literal upper hand in battle...
Angelia: Impossible! Uncle Theodore must have had other plans in mind!
Nigel: Even so, why were these plans not made known to you, the princess?
Naya: No way. To make the castle fly, that would require a huge amount of Soul Energy!
Naya: Where will we get that from?
Yamitsuki: From the Dragoneye Gem itself.
Yamitsuki: The Dragoneye Gem harbors infinite Soul Energy. With the proper rune devices, the castle will fly.

Angelia: The Kingdom bought the Dragoneye Gem from
Atlas forty-five years ago. It is true we've been
trying to extract Soul Energy efficiently ever since.
Angelia: King Theodore was especially enthusiastic...
Angelia: He kept telling me it would benefit the people!
Nigel: You've been lied to all this time! Why won't you accept the truth?!
Angelia: And why should I believe what you say?!
Nigel: Then, are you willing to bet on it?
Nigel: My sources say that Theodore acquired something secret from the Desert Bazaar, and brought it inside the castle.
Angelia: What's that?
Nigel: I'm not sure, but it has to do with this conspiracy.
Angelia: Where's your evidence?

Nigel: I don't have it...yet. I intend to visit the desert and
make Theodore's contact speak. Are you coming?
Angelia: Of course!
Naya: Angel! What are you thinking!
Angelia: I want to prove that Uncle Theodore was falsely accused! Everything Nigel said is a lie!
Nigel: Fine. We'll see who speaks the truth.
Naya: Wait! If Her Highness is going, I'm coming along!
Nigel: Suit yourself.
Yamitsuki: I have other errands, I won't be joining this trip.
Nigel: You...you going back to that strange professor?
Yamitsuki: Mhm.
Naya: Hmph...another crazy woman.
Angelia: Nigel, when do we leave?
Nigel: I've arranged a rune chariot. We leave in ten days.
Angelia: So be it!
Nigel: But if Theodore is as I say, promise me one thing.
Angelia: What's that?
Nigel: Join me in stopping his malicious plans!

How should I know? He's always hard to predict.
Apologies for the long wait,

Of course!
Angel! What are you thinking!
I want to prove that Uncle Theodore was falsely accused! Everything Nigel said is a lie!
Fine. We'll see who speaks the truth.
Wait! If Her Highness is going, I'm coming along!
Suit yourself.
I have other errands, I won't be joining this trip.
You...you going back to that strange professor?
Mhm.
Hmph...another crazy woman.
Nigel, when do we leave?
I've arranged a rune chariot. We leave in ten days.
So be it!
But if Theodore is as I say, promise me one thing.
What's that?
Join me in stopping his malicious plans!
